attributes.title: Crypto Technology Hype Cycle
attributes.description: The Crypto Technology Hype Cycle provides an overview of the current state of technology involved with cryptocurrencies.

items.title: Blockchain
items.description: The blockchain is at the core of cryptocurrencies. In short it represents a public ledger of who owns what.

items.title: Tokens (Ethereum
items.description: Ethereum based tokens go by the ERC-20 standard, and allow third parties to launch custom tokens on top of the Ethereum network. For technical details: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-20.md

items.title: Tokens (Stellar)
items.description: Stellar tokens are custom tokens utilizing the Stellar network.

items.title: Smart Contracts
items.description: Smart Contracts is a program that is executed on the blockchain network.

items.title: dApps
items.description: dApps is short for decentralized apps. It allows programs to execute code on the blockchain network. An interesting overiew: https://www.stateofthedapps.com/

items.title: Lightning Network
items.description: The lightning network is a protocol on top of the blockchain, allowing instant transactions over a payment channel. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lightning_Network
